about_the_game:
AutoDepth uses AI based depth map generation to give any image a new lease on life.
Using AutoDepth Image Viewer, view your favorite photos/artworks in a whole new dimension from the safety of your personal computer!
With a simple user interface that can be used with a mix of VR and non-VR devices, you can create a playlist of your images to browse as they're automatically stretched into 3D behind the scenes.
Take the experience even further with a set of interactive tools that allow you to engage with the imagery in unique ways you won't find anywhere else.
AutoDepth utilizes a custom shader to raymarch the depth map and view images in crispy 3D quality and apply fun effects.

Features:

  • View Any Image In 3D Automatically
  • Custom Image Playlists
  • Intuitive UI with ToolTips
  • Usable in VR and Non-VR
  • Export: (3D model, depth maps, side-by-side depth maps)
  • Persistent individual viewing settings so you can curate how each image should look
  • Mouse support so you don't need to get out your VR controllers just to look at some images.
  • Force Push to Manipulate Image Depth
  • goo mode

name: AutoDepth Image Viewer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: A CUDA capable NVidia GPU is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: View any image in 3D with automatic depth map generation and fun interactive gizmos.
